channel.title: T&R
channel.generator: Webpage HTML Export plugin for Obsidian
channel.dc:creator: Will Olsen

item.title: Notes
item.description:
- Can use some materials from last year - Blue and Orange needles from last year are sufficient - Accessible sharps bins are important for peer-to-peer vaccinations - Need to check regulatory requirements re: pre-drawn up vaccines for peer-to-peer vaccinations (refrigerate?, how long before can we draw them up?, etc.)

2x Prefilled Fluvax (to be made up prior to class in bulk):

2x 0.5mL Luer Lock Syringe
2x Blue 23G needle (25mm)
2x MMR vaccine reconstitution + injection:

2x 0.5mL Luer Lock Syringe
2x Orange 25G needle (16mm)
2x 'Vaccine' vial to be reconstituted
2x Pink 18G drawing up needle (sharp): like this one
2x 10mL water for injection plastic ampoule (can do 1 probably - or they can share)
Total quantities per student (Non-vaccinating groups):

~Extra 15% materials per session would be handy to have in the room in case of errors, etc.



1x Prefilled Fluvax:

1x 0.5mL Luer Lock Syringe
1x Blue 23G needle (25mm)
2x MMR reconstitution:

2x 0.5mL Luer Lock Syringe
2x Orange 25G needle (16mm)
2x 'Vaccine' vial to be reconstituted
2x Pink 18G drawing up needle (sharp): like this one
2x 10mL water for injection plastic ampoule (can do 1 probably - or they can share)

To be drawn up immediately prior to session by tutors/approved vaccinators
1x Prefilled Fluvax (Sterile):

1x 0.5mL Luer Lock Syringe
1x Blue 23G needle (25mm)
1x Prefilled MMR (Sterile):

1x 0.5mL Luer Lock Syringe
1x Orange 25G needle (16mm)
For drawing up (for ~50 students [overestimating]):

1x box of 0.9% NaCl for injection 10mL
1x box of Pink 18G drawing up needle (can be blunt)
Total quantities per student (Peer-to-peer vaccinating groups - practice):

~Extra 15% materials per session would be handy to have in the room in case of errors, etc.
Total quantities per student (Per-to-peer vaccinating groups - injection):
item.dc:creator: Will Olsen
